Query the network to find a transaction chain


```graphql
transactionChain(
  address: Address!
  pagingAddress: Address
): [Transaction]
```

> 
>

### Type

#### [`Transaction`](/build/api/schema/objects/transaction) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
